name: POMWright
description: POMWright is a TypeScript-based framework designed for creating and maintaining Page Object Models. It streamlines locator management by automatically generating nested/chained locators from flat and atomic locator structures which can be dynamically updated throughout tests. This significantly reduces code duplication and makes tests easier to read, write, and maintain.
